title: What's 2020's fashion trend going to be? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alot of the 1990s and 1940s are coming back. Shoes, we have Military Boots, Double buckle Monks and Chelseas. Sneakers are leather and less chunkie.  Jackets, Denim, distressed or embellished, but you can buy a cheaper one and do it up yourself. Also the denim and hoodie mix stays with us. Leather Jackets, biker and retro or old racing jackets are back. Also bomber and suede. Hoodies are still around. Fleece pullovers are back.     Shorts, we have shorter for men, and brighter. Bermudas and plank shorts, denim too.  Shirts, Henleys, Stripes, Polos, Cuban and Hawaiian are still in. Flannels too stay here, brighten up your wardrobe.      Suits, brighter colors and designs, stripes to are in. Double breasted jackets and vests or sport coats too.   Pants, jeans not so skinny. Cordouroy and Chinos are back. Distressed jeans stay around. Lighter washes coming back too. Don't just stick with blue, wear black, green, brown and grey. Also higher waists are returning.   ACCESSORIES, hats, roll up, fedoras, boller, and newsboys are in.    TIES, brighter colors and stripes are in.  Watches and bracelets, 2 color styles are in and vintage styles too.  BAGs, fanny packs or butt bags are back. Also messenger bags, and back packs. Leather is in and multi colors.  Sunglasses and beannies. Catseyes and 90s styles.  Take these ideas and mix and match stuff you have, plus thrift shop to have the best deals and save money.
